digest_items.title: Enable audit logging
digest_items.why: Audit logs are essential for incident response and compliance
digest_items.fix: Log authentication events, data access, and configuration changes

digest_items.title: Review cloud storage permissions
digest_items.why: Misconfigured S3 buckets and storage accounts lead to data leaks
digest_items.fix: Ensure buckets are private and use IAM policies for access control

digest_items.title: Use HSTS headers
digest_items.why: HTTP Strict Transport Security forces browsers to only connect via HTTPS

digest_items.title: Review user access permissions
digest_items.why: Stale permissions from former employees pose security risk
digest_items.fix: Conduct quarterly access reviews and remove unnecessary permissions

digest_items.title: Verify SSL certificate validity
digest_items.why: Expired certificates break HTTPS and expose users to MITM attacks
digest_items.fix: Set up automated renewal with Let's Encrypt or monitor expiry dates

digest_items.title: Use secure file upload validation
digest_items.why: Malicious file uploads can lead to remote code execution
digest_items.fix: Validate file types, scan for malware, and store uploads outside webroot
